### Garbage Collection and Disposal Services

#### Tender Announcement

The Parks Canada Agency is soliciting bids for garbage collection and disposal services in the Western Management Area of the Cape Breton Highlands National Park.

* **Solicitation Number**: 5P300-22-0333/A
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 20, 2023, at 2:00 PM AST
* **Contract Period**: From May 1, 2023 to October 29, 2024 with the option to add two additional one-year periods

The successful bidder will be responsible for collecting and disposing of garbage and recyclables in the park. The contract requires the services to be performed in accordance with the National Parks Regulations and in compliance with all applicable laws, rules, and regulations.

**Eligibility and Qualifications**
 Suppliers who consider themselves qualified to provide these services are invited to submit their bids. Bidders are expected to have a thorough understanding of the park's rules and regulations, as well as the ability to adhere to environmental standards and guidelines.

**Bid Submissions**
 Bids must be submitted via email or fax and must be marked with the solicitation number, project name, and the number of emails included (if sending multiple emails). Emails with links to bid documents will not be accepted. The maximum email file size that can be received is 15 megabytes. Late submissions will not be considered.

**Contact Information**
For any technical and contractual inquiries, please contact Bonnie Knott at bonnie.knott@pc.gc.ca or 1-877-558-2349.

### Important Documents
The solicitation documents, including the request for quote and the contract, are available on the Government of Canada's tendering service website at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca).

### Trade Agreements
This procurement falls under the following trade agreements: Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.
